_header: Saint Paul the apostle thus says he
_description: The Seven Works of Mercy Bodily — ten couplets

CULFf238.First Lines:
Seynt poule the apostell þus seyþe heDoyþ all youre
                    werkys in charyteffor werke of mercy analylyþ nouȝtBut hyt
                    in charyte be wrought…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…These ben the werkys seueneffulfylle ys them þat wole
                    haue heuene
CULFf238.Attributed Title: Here suen þe vii werkis of merci bodili (f. 32rb)
CULFf238.Facsimiles:
McSparran,  Frances,  and  Pamela R. Robinson.  
             “Introduction.” 
             Cambridge University Library MS Ff.2.38.
         London: Scolar Press, 1979.

BLHar1706.First Lines: Seynt poule apostel þus sayþ heDoþ alle your werkys in charyte…
BLHar1706.Last Lines: …þese ben e werkes of mercy seueneffulfylle þou hem þat wolle haue heuene
BLHar1706.Note: Latin terms for works of mercy written in rubric in outer margins beside first lines for each work.
BLHar1706.Attributed Title: Septem opera misericordie (rubric preceding first line (f. 206v)
BLHar1706.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 1706.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_1706.

BLHar2339.First Lines:
Seint poul þe apostle þus seiþ heDoiþ alle
                    ȝoure werkis in charite…
BLHar2339.Last Lines:
…These ben þe werkis seueneffulfille ȝe hem þat
                    wolen haue heuene
BLHar2339.Attributed Title:
Þese ben þe vij werkis of Ihesu bodili (rubricated, f.
                        118v)

Lam491.First Lines:
Saynt paule þe apostyl þus sais hedos al youre werkes in
                    charite…
Lam491.Last Lines:
…þise ben þe werkes of mercy sevenffulfylles
                    þam al þat wyl hafe hevyn
Lam491.Attributed Title: Here begynnes þe vij werkys of mercy (f. 295va)
Lam491.Editions:
Bülbring,  Karl Daniel. 
             “über die Handschrift Nr. 491 der Lambeth-Bibliothek.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         86 (1891): 383-92: 389.

Ushaw28.First Lines:
Sent paule apostile þus saithedo alle ȝoue werkes in
                    chariteffor werkes of mercy a vailen noughtbut þei in charite be
                    wrought…
Ushaw28.Attributed Title: Septem virtutes contra septem peccata predicta (f. 77)
